ch.uzh.ddis.katts.query
Class Query

java.lang.Object
  ch.uzh.ddis.katts.query.Query

public class Query
extends java.lang.Object

The query class is the root element of a query structure. It contains a list of nodes. Each node is linked by streams. All the nodes and the query builds the topology configuration. The effective bolts and spouts are implemented in a separated package.

Author:
Thomas Hunziker

createFromFile

public static Query createFromFile(java.lang.String path)
                            throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                   java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                   javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
This method loads the query from a XML file. The XML file must be in a valid, in sense of the XSD, and serialized form.
